name: Strikers 1945+
description:
"STRIKERS 1945 PLUS" is a shoot 'em up game released by Psikyo in 1999. Make use of Shots, Super Shots, and Support Attacks to make your way through a chaotic dogfight!
Historical piston fighters, such as the P-38 Lightning, are ready to rumble!!
A state of the art arcade shoot 'em up from the masters of the genre, Psikyo.
